  "email_chain": [
    {
      "from": "Michael Chen (Charterer)",
      "to": "Sarah Williams (Broker)",
      "subject": "Inquiry - Iron Ore Cargo ex Newcastle to Qingdao",
      "timestamp": "2024-02-01 09:15:00",
      "body": "Hi Sarah,\n\nLooking for a vessel to carry 170,000mt iron ore from Newcastle to Qingdao. Laycan 25-30 March 2024. Could you check market availability and rates?\n\nThanks,\nMichael"
    },
    {
      "from": "Sarah Williams (Broker)",
      "to": "Michael Chen (Charterer)",
      "subject": "Re: Inquiry - Iron Ore Cargo ex Newcastle to Qingdao",
      "timestamp": "2024-02-01 10:45:00",
      "body": "Dear Michael,\n\nThanks for your inquiry. I have MV OCEAN FORTUNE (2015 built, 180K DWT, LOA 292m) open in the area.\n\nOwners indicating freight in low USD 12s pmT basis 1/1 free out.\n\nVessel details:\n- 9 holds/hatches\n- Grabs 4 x 30cbm\n- Last 3 cargoes: Iron ore\n\nPlease advise if interested to pursue.\n\nBest regards,\nSarah"
    },
    {
      "from": "Michael Chen (Charterer)",
      "to": "Sarah Williams (Broker)",
      "subject": "Re: Inquiry - Iron Ore Cargo ex Newcastle to Qingdao",
      "timestamp": "2024-02-01 11:30:00",
      "body": "Sarah,\n\nThanks for the quick response. Vessel specs look suitable, but rate is on high side. Market indicates low 11s. Can you check if owners would consider USD 11.25 pmT?\n\nDemurrage rate to be discussed, but thinking USD 25,000 pdpr.\n\nRegards,\nMichael"
    },
    {
      "from": "Sarah Williams (Broker)",
      "to": "Michael Chen (Charterer)",
      "subject": "Re: Inquiry - Iron Ore Cargo ex Newcastle to Qingdao",
      "timestamp": "2024-02-01 13:20:00",
      "body": "Michael,\n\nSpoke with owners. They can offer USD 11.75 pmT with demurrage at USD 27,500 pdpr.\n\nAlso to note:\n- L/D rate: 25,000mt PWWD SHINC\n- Laycan: 25-30 March confirmed\n\nPlease advise if workable.\n\nBest regards,\nSarah"
    },
    {
      "from": "Michael Chen (Charterer)",
      "to": "Sarah Williams (Broker)",
      "subject": "Re: Inquiry - Iron Ore Cargo ex Newcastle to Qingdao",
      "timestamp": "2024-02-01 14:45:00",
      "body": "Sarah,\n\nCan split the difference - USD 11.50 pmT with demurrage at USD 26,500 pdpr?\n\nIf owners agree, we can move forward with recap.\n\nBest regards,\nMichael"
    },
    {
      "from": "Sarah Williams (Broker)",
      "to": "Michael Chen (Charterer)",
      "subject": "Re: Inquiry - Iron Ore Cargo ex Newcastle to Qingdao",
      "timestamp": "2024-02-01 15:30:00",
      "body": "Michael,\n\nOwners have accepted your last. Will prepare recap with main terms:\n- Freight: USD 11.50 pmT\n- Demurrage: USD 26,500 pdpr\n- Cargo: 170,000mt Iron Ore 10% MOLOO\n- Loading: Newcastle\n- Discharging: Qingdao\n- Laycan: 25-30 March 2024\n\nWill send full recap shortly for your review.\n\nKind regards,\nSarah"
    }
  ],

      "body": "Sarah,\n\nThanks, but mid 50s is too rich for us. We're seeing low 50s in the market. Would owners consider WS 51.5?\n\nAlso need confirmation on vessel's STS history and last 3 cargoes.\n\nRegards,\nTom"

      "body": "Tom,\n\nSpoke to owners. They can come down to WS 53.25, but that's their floor. Last 3 cargoes were Arabian Light Crude, all clean receipts. No STS ops in last 6 months.\n\nDemurrage would be USD 35,000 pdpr. Laycan 17-19 Feb still good.\n\nBest regards,\nSarah"
    },
    {
      "from": "Tom Wilson (Charterer)",
      "to": "Sarah Chen (Broker)",
      "subject": "Re: Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment from Ras Tanura to Ningbo",
      "timestamp": "2024-01-16 08:45:00",
      "body": "Sarah,\n\nWe can work with WS 53.25. Please confirm following terms:\n- Laycan 17-19 Feb\n- L/D rate 120,000 bbl/hr\n- Demurrage USD 35,000 pdpr\n- 1.5% total comm\n\nIf all agreed, we can proceed with subjects.\n\nRegards,\nTom"
    },
    {
      "from": "Sarah Chen (Broker)",
